name: XCSourceEditorCommandInvocation
desc: An object that identifies the command issued to your extension and provides the contents of the active source editor.

items.name: var buffer: XCSourceTextBuffer
items.desc: The buffer of source text upon which the command can operate.

items.name: var commandIdentifier: String
items.desc: The identifier of the command that the user invoked.

items.name: var cancellationHandler: () -> Void
items.desc: A handler to be invoked by Xcode to indicate that the invocation has been canceled by the user.
